about_the_game:
Dark Memories: Hospital


"Step into the shadows of your past in this gripping psychological horror experience."

Dark Memories: Hospital is the first installment in the Dark Memories anthology series, where each game explores the depths of human psyche through immersive, first-person narrative experiences.

Overview

You are a night shift janitor in a seemingly ordinary hospital, struggling with the weight of your past and the uncertainty of your future. As you navigate through the quiet corridors and empty rooms, you'll soon discover that the hospital holds secrets far darker than the shadows that lurk in its corners.

Gameplay

Dark Memories: Hospital is primarily a first-person narrative experience with elements of exploration, task completion, and environmental puzzle-solving.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features objects stained with blood and includes dialogue that contains strong language and profanity, which are integral to the narrative and ambiance of the investigative experience.

legal_notice: Note: This game deals with mature themes and is intended for adult audiences.
name: Dark Memories: Hospital

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 8100 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 2GB or RX 560 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB or RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Step into the shoes of a troubled night shift janitor in a city hospital. Confront your past mistakes and current struggles while uncovering unsettling truths. A gripping, psychological journey of redemption and survival in the Dark Memories anthology.
